message.body: Hey there! Congrats on graduating! :) Are you going to be home at all this week so I can see you? Also, if you happen to be home this Friday, would you have any interest in helping me load the moving truck Friday afternoon/evening for $8/hr? My dad says he's "getting old" or something and we could use help :P

Thanks! I just got home last night and would love to hang out this week. Maybe Wednesday or thurs evening? Is anyone else home? I don't think I can help on Friday cause I've got a couple doctor's appointments scattered throughout the day...wait, are your parents moving?
No no! Haha I am. Charly is around until Thursday.
Haha ok. Well I'm free after 6 on wednesday and after 3 on Thursday. We should all get dinner or something.
Want to get dinner Wednesday with me and Charly?
Sure! My emerson classes end at 4:45, so we could even meet up in the city if you guys want. Or I could make my way back to Needham and we could go out around here.
